greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: tau(n)*phi(n/k) if k|n, else 0.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: A127528 := proc(n,k) if n mod k = 0 then numtheory[tau](n)*numtheory[phi](n/k) ; else  0; end if; end proc:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 17 2007
